  • Constructor Details

    • AddUser

      public AddUser​(java.lang.String u, java.lang.String n, boolean Administrator)
      Constructor initializes if the current user has administrative rights
      Parameters:
      u - : gets the username of the current user.
      n - : gets the name of the current user.
      Administrator - : initializes the Admin variable with the logged in user's privilege level.

    • AddUser

      public AddUser​(boolean SecureBoot, boolean Administrator, java.lang.String Name, java.lang.String Username)
      Constructor to initialize the "Administrator" user during the setup program This constructor can also be reused for other upcoming implementation, with advancements. DEVELOPMENT AND TESTING IN PROGRESS
      Parameters:
      SecureBoot - : Initializes the SecureBoot variable
      Administrator - : Checks if current user is an administrator to provide an option to create another administrator account
      Name - : Receives the name of the user from the (setup) previous program
      Username - : Receives the username of the accound from the (setup) previous program
